text: James A. Morris was a professional baseball player who played pitcher and outfielder in the Major Leagues in 1884 for the Baltimore Monumentals of the Union Association. He appeared in one game for the Monumentals, and was hitless in three at-bats. ==External links== Category:Major League Baseball outfielders Category:Major League Baseball pitchers Category:Baltimore Monumentals players Category:19th-century baseball players Category:Chambersburg (minor league baseball) players Category:Baseball players from New Jersey Category:Sportspeople from Trenton, New Jersey
title: James Morris (baseball)
